sentences.english: Plus, although she's a vampire, she doesn't go around killing innocent humans.
sentences.chinese: 最后，尽管她是一名吸血鬼，她并没有滥杀无辜人类。

sentences.english: If the scourge slay suddenly, he will laugh at the trial of the innocent.
sentences.chinese: 若忽然遭杀害之祸，他必戏笑无辜的人遇难。

sentences.english: Slip away to innocent days with this fantastically fun collection of jigsaws with a nostalgic theme.
sentences.chinese: 溜掉无辜天这个亲密乐趣收集灵感与怀旧主题。

sentences.english: In this story, Tom was easy to kill two of Chinese innocent safeguard.
sentences.chinese: 在里面，阿汤哥轻易杀了，无辜的中国保安。

sentences.english: Australians generally believe that Corby is innocent and the punishment is too severe.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲人普遍认为科尔比是无辜，而且刑罚过重。

sentences.english: The idea of a "civilian" depends on an association between innocence and the non-combatant.
sentences.chinese: 平民的概念是取决于无辜和非参战的结合。

sentences.english: Youhave murdered a innocent man and have taken his belongings too.
sentences.chinese: 你谋杀了一个无辜的人并强占了他的财产。

sentences.english: How could such an innocent girl be a prisoner?
sentences.chinese: 这么一个无辜的女孩怎么会是重刑犯？

sentences.english: The case involved many innocent people.
sentences.chinese: 这一案件牵涉了许多无辜的人。

sentences.english: There will always be innocent casualites of war, but this was not the case.
sentences.chinese: 战争中的无辜伤亡在所难免，但是，这次情况不同。

sentences.english: An innocent scratching of your cheek or rubbing or your eyes can transfer that bacteria to your face.
sentences.chinese: 看似无辜的抓脸揉眼都会传输细菌到你的脸上。

sentences.english: I was convinced that I’d killed an innocent animal.
sentences.chinese: 我以为自己撞死了一头无辜的动物。

sentences.english: Missing gnaws the pain to hold one kind inexplicably to pace back and forth innocently in my side.
sentences.chinese: 思念啃着痛含着一种莫名的无辜在我身边徘徊着。

sentences.english: Hong Kong itself is hardly guiltless.
sentences.chinese: 香港自己很难说是无辜的。

sentences.english: As we know, the incident tragically ended in the deaths of eight innocent civilians.
sentences.chinese: 据我所知，事件导致8名无辜平民死亡，这是个悲剧。

sentences.english: We have tried hard to make sure that this material does not put innocents at harm.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常努力的确保这些材料的披露不会殃及无辜。

definition: righteous indignation fills one's breast (idiom); to feel indignant at injustice
to accuse wrongly/to treat unjustly/injustice/wronged/not worthwhile
guilty and deserves to be punished (idiom); entirely appropriate chastisement/the punishment fits the crime
lit. not an inch of steel (idiom); unarmed and defenseless
bitter and hateful (idiom)/to grieve and lament (over sth)
